panels.description: Current open PRs. Point-in-time snapshot - not affected by date range.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo", 
  p.author as "Author", 
  p.title as "Title", 
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(json_extract(value, '$.name'), ', ') 
     FROM json_each(json_extract(p.data, '$.labels'))), 
    ''
  ) as "Labels",
  CASE 
    WHEN r.state = 'APPROVED' THEN 'âœ… Approved' 
    WHEN r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED' THEN 'ðŸ”„ Changes Requested' 
    ELSE 'ðŸ‘€ Needs Review' 
  END as "Status", 
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.updated_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Since Activity"
FROM pull_requests p 
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT repo, pr_number, state FROM pr_reviews r1 
    WHERE submitted_at = (SELECT MAX(submitted_at) FROM pr_reviews r2 WHERE r2.pr_number = r1.pr_number AND r2.repo = r1.repo)
) r ON p.repo = r.repo AND p.number = r.pr_number 
WHERE p.state = 'open' 
  AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') 
  AND p.repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo", 
  p.author as "Author", 
  p.title as "Title", 
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(json_extract(value, '$.name'), ', ') 
     FROM json_each(json_extract(p.data, '$.labels'))), 
    ''
  ) as "Labels",
  CASE 
    WHEN r.state = 'APPROVED' THEN 'âœ… Approved' 
    WHEN r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED' THEN 'ðŸ”„ Changes Requested' 
    ELSE 'ðŸ‘€ Needs Review' 
  END as "Status", 
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.updated_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Since Activity"
FROM pull_requests p 
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT repo, pr_number, state FROM pr_reviews r1 
    WHERE submitted_at = (SELECT MAX(submitted_at) FROM pr_reviews r2 WHERE r2.pr_number = r1.pr_number AND r2.repo = r1.repo)
) r ON p.repo = r.repo AND p.number = r.pr_number 
WHERE p.state = 'open' 
  AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') 
  AND p.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC

panels.title: Team PRs

panels.description: Current open PRs. Point-in-time snapshot - not affected by date range.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo", 
  p.author as "Author", 
  p.title as "Title", 
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(json_extract(value, '$.name'), ', ') 
     FROM json_each(json_extract(p.data, '$.labels'))), 
    ''
  ) as "Labels",
  CASE 
    WHEN r.state = 'APPROVED' THEN 'âœ… Approved' 
    WHEN r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED' THEN 'ðŸ”„ Changes Requested' 
    ELSE 'ðŸ‘€ Needs Review' 
  END as "Status",
  CASE 
    WHEN NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM pull_requests p2 
      WHERE p2.author = p.author 
        AND p2.merged_at IS NOT NULL 
        AND p2.created_at < p.created_at
    ) THEN 'ðŸ†• First PR!'
    ELSE ''
  END as "New Contributor",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.updated_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Since Activity"
FROM pull_requests p 
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT repo, pr_number, state FROM pr_reviews r1 
    WHERE submitted_at = (SELECT MAX(submitted_at) FROM pr_reviews r2 WHERE r2.pr_number = r1.pr_number AND r2.repo = r1.repo)
) r ON p.repo = r.repo AND p.number = r.pr_number 
WHERE p.state = 'open' 
  AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') 
  AND p.repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC

    WHEN r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED' THEN 'ðŸ”„ Changes Requested' 
    ELSE 'ðŸ‘€ Needs Review' 
  END as "Status",
  CASE 
    WHEN NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM pull_requests p2 
      WHERE p2.author = p.author 
        AND p2.merged_at IS NOT NULL 
        AND p2.created_at < p.created_at
    ) THEN 'ðŸ†• First PR!'
    ELSE ''
  END as "New Contributor",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.updated_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Since Activity"
FROM pull_requests p 
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT repo, pr_number, state FROM pr_reviews r1 
    WHERE submitted_at = (SELECT MAX(submitted_at) FROM pr_reviews r2 WHERE r2.pr_number = r1.pr_number AND r2.repo = r1.repo)
) r ON p.repo = r.repo AND p.number = r.pr_number 
WHERE p.state = 'open' 
  AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') 
  AND p.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC

panels.title: Community PRs

panels.description: Current open issues without a milestone. Point-in-time snapshot - not affected by date range.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  repo as "Repo", 
  title as "Title", 
  json_extract(data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(json_extract(value, '$.name'), ', ') 
     FROM json_each(json_extract(data, '$.labels'))), 
    ''
  ) as "Labels",
  json_extract(data, '$.comments') as "Comments",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open"
FROM issues 
WHERE state = 'open' AND json_extract(data, '$.milestone') IS NULL AND repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  repo as "Repo", 
  title as "Title", 
  json_extract(data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(json_extract(value, '$.name'), ', ') 
     FROM json_each(json_extract(data, '$.labels'))), 
    ''
  ) as "Labels",
  json_extract(data, '$.comments') as "Comments",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open"
FROM issues 
WHERE state = 'open' AND json_extract(data, '$.milestone') IS NULL AND repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC

panels.title: Untriaged Issues (No Milestone)

panels.description: Current open issues sorted by upvotes. Point-in-time snapshot - not affected by date range.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  repo as "Repo",
  title as "Title", 
  json_extract(data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  json_extract(data, '$.reactions."+1"') as "Upvotes" 
FROM issues WHERE state = 'open' AND repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Upvotes" DESC LIMIT 20
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  repo as "Repo",
  title as "Title", 
  json_extract(data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  json_extract(data, '$.reactions."+1"') as "Upvotes" 
FROM issues WHERE state = 'open' AND repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Upvotes" DESC LIMIT 20

FROM issues WHERE state = 'open' AND repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')

panels.title: Most Discussed Issues

panels.description: Current open PRs with no activity in 7+ days. Point-in-time snapshot.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo",
  p.author as "Author",
  CASE 
    WHEN json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') THEN 'Team'
    ELSE 'Community'
  END as "Type",
  p.title as "Title",
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.updated_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Stale"
FROM pull_requests p
WHERE p.state = 'open'
  AND date(p.updated_at) < date('now', '-7 days')
  AND p.repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Days Stale" DESC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo",
  p.author as "Author",
  CASE 
    WHEN json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') THEN 'Team'
    ELSE 'Community'
  END as "Type",
  p.title as "Title",
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.updated_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Stale"
FROM pull_requests p
WHERE p.state = 'open'
  AND date(p.updated_at) < date('now', '-7 days')
  AND p.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Days Stale" DESC

panels.title: âš ï¸ Stale PRs (7d+ No Activity)

panels.description: Current open PRs from first-time contributors. Point-in-time snapshot - not affected by date range.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo",
  p.author as "Author",
  p.title as "Title",
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  CASE 
    WHEN r.state = 'APPROVED' THEN 'âœ… Approved' 
    WHEN r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED' THEN 'ðŸ”„ Changes Requested' 
    ELSE 'ðŸ‘€ Needs Review' 
  END as "Status",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open"
FROM pull_requests p
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT repo, pr_number, state FROM pr_reviews r1 
    WHERE submitted_at = (SELECT MAX(submitted_at) FROM pr_reviews r2 WHERE r2.pr_number = r1.pr_number AND r2.repo = r1.repo)
) r ON p.repo = r.repo AND p.number = r.pr_number
WHERE p.state = 'open'
  AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR')
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pull_requests p2 
    WHERE p2.author = p.author 
      AND p2.merged_at IS NOT NULL 
      AND p2.created_at < p.created_at
  )
  AND p.repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC

SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo",
  p.author as "Author",
  p.title as "Title",
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  CASE 
    WHEN r.state = 'APPROVED' THEN 'âœ… Approved' 
    WHEN r.state = 'CHANGES_REQUESTED' THEN 'ðŸ”„ Changes Requested' 
    ELSE 'ðŸ‘€ Needs Review' 
  END as "Status",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open"
FROM pull_requests p
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT repo, pr_number, state FROM pr_reviews r1 
    WHERE submitted_at = (SELECT MAX(submitted_at) FROM pr_reviews r2 WHERE r2.pr_number = r1.pr_number AND r2.repo = r1.repo)
) r ON p.repo = r.repo AND p.number = r.pr_number
WHERE p.state = 'open'
  AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR')
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pull_requests p2 
    WHERE p2.author = p.author 
      AND p2.merged_at IS NOT NULL 
      AND p2.created_at < p.created_at
  )
  AND p.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC

panels.title: ðŸŒŸ First-Time Contributors (Needs Welcome!)

panels.description: Current open Dependabot PRs. Point-in-time snapshot - not affected by date range.

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo",
  p.title as "Title",
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open"
FROM pull_requests p
WHERE p.state = 'open'
  AND (p.author LIKE '%[bot]%' OR p.author = 'dependabot')
  AND p.repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging')
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  p.repo as "Repo",
  p.title as "Title",
  json_extract(p.data, '$.html_url') as "URL",
  CAST((julianday('now') - julianday(p.created_at)) as INTEGER) as "Days Open"
FROM pull_requests p
WHERE p.state = 'open'
  AND (p.author LIKE '%[bot]%' OR p.author = 'dependabot')
  AND p.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY "Days Open" DESC
